      • GetDenominators

        public static java.math.BigInteger[] GetDenominators(java.math.BigInteger denominator,
                                     java.math.BigInteger base)
        For a mixed decimal, this tells the operative denominator for the terminating and repeating parts
        Parameters:
        denominator -
        base -
        Returns:
        Array of BigIntegers which are the denominators associated with the terminating and repeating part

      • RepeatingNumDigitsRequired

        public static int RepeatingNumDigitsRequired(java.math.BigInteger denominator,
                             java.math.BigInteger base)
        For a repeating decimal, this tells the number of digits required for it. The denominator must be coprime to the base to call this function. The code works by calculating the order of the base modulo the denominator. The number of digits required for 1/r where gcd(r,base)=1 is equal to the order of the element base in the group Z_r star.
        Parameters:
        denominator - the denominator
        base - the base number
        Returns:
        the number of digits required for the repeating decimal

      • TerminatingNumDigitsRequired

        public static int TerminatingNumDigitsRequired(java.math.BigInteger denominator,
                               java.math.BigInteger base)
        This tells the number of digits required for a terminating decimal. The denominator must divide a power of the base in order to use this function.
        Parameters:
        denominator - the denominator
        base - the base for our representation
        Returns:
        the number of digits required for the terminating decimal
